attributes.action: Get government support and funding to find a cure for Raynaud's and Scleroderma
attributes.additional_details: At present people are suffering all around the world with either Raynaud's or Scleroderma and barely any funding is going towards helping find a cure. Raynaud's can be an early symptom of Scleroderma however the people who do have Scleroderma this disease may actually kill them. If a cure is found then people that have been forgotten and in the dark for years may actually have a chance to live a life they deserve.
attributes.background: Scleroderma is an autoimmune disease which causes chronic hardening of the connective tissue and Raynaud's is excessively reduced blood flow. I suffer with Raynaud's myself and know how horrible it can be due to personal experineces with the condition. Both of these can be serious.
